LabCam
 
The LabCam is an IOS & Android App to associate a camera in a mobile device with cloud storage in your Keeper account. This can be used to visually document laboratory experiments, but also to share impressions from e.g. conferences or fieldwork with colleagues “in real time”. OCR (optical character recognition) allows you to extract and store text from photos; generated .md-files can subsequently be edited.
